channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Human faeces and drug use on shared alleyway, 18th October
item.description:
On the alleyway off Powerscroft Rd leading to 63-76 Lower Clapton Road, people have been leaving human faeces and taking drugs. We all, including kids, have to use this alleyway daily to get out of our flats. The poo smell is so strong and a health hazard.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lower Clapton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loud music, 18th October
item.description:
Been going on for weeks, same crowd with a soundsystem playing music all night

item.title: Fly tipping, 18th October
item.description:
Domino has dumped their bathroom outside by the bins, can signs be put up? Cameras? This is a constant problem, I think builders know the can drive down here and dump stuff.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Felstead Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bannister Road Thames water, 18th October
item.description:
Terms water has closed this entire road for a period of at least a month however they have not informed TFL nor the council so the buses are not on diversion nor posted just stopping and very confused as well it's causing me to disruption to traffic as once again Thames water has not posted sensible signs to explain a situation Resulting in gridlock of traffic Thousands of pedestrians not knowing where to go And disruption to the entire community
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn Lane, North Kensington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling bin stolen, 18th October
item.description:
My recycling bin (clearly marked 19, as I live at 19 Bonfield Road) has been stolen on the night it was put out for the binmen. A neighbour of mine caught the thief walking towards Clarendon Rise on her security camera. I have looked in vain for it all over the surrounding streets. Please could you replace it. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Bonfield Road, Hither Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
